+/*
+ * @test MonitorWithDeadObjectDetachThreadTest
+ * @summary This test checks that ObjectMonitors with dead objects don't
+            cause asserts, crashes, or failures when the owning thread
+            is detached.
+ * @requires os.family != "windows"
+ * @library /testlibrary /test/lib
+ * @modules jdk.management
+ * @run main/native MonitorWithDeadObjectDetachThreadTest
+ */
+
+public class MonitorWithDeadObjectDetachThreadTest {
+    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
+        // Create an ObjectMonitor with a dead object from an
+        // attached thread.
+        MonitorWithDeadObjectHelper.createMonitorWithDeadObject();
+    }
+}

+/*
+ * @test MonitorWithDeadObjectDumpThreadsBeforeDetachTest
+ * @summary This test checks that ObjectMonitors with dead objects don't
+            cause asserts, crashes, or failures when threads are dumped
+            before the thread has been detached.
+ * @requires os.family != "windows"
+ * @library /testlibrary /test/lib
+ * @modules jdk.management
+ * @run main/native MonitorWithDeadObjectDumpThreadsBeforeDetachTest
+ */
+
+public class MonitorWithDeadObjectDumpThreadsBeforeDetachTest {
+    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
+        MonitorWithDeadObjectHelper.createMonitorWithDeadObjectDumpThreadsBeforeDetach();
+    }
+}
